text: alleṅkil, ñaṅṅaḷkk oru vēdagranthaṁ avataricc kiṭṭiyirunneṅkil ñaṅṅaḷ avarekkāḷ sanmārgikaḷākumāyirunnu enn niṅṅaḷ paṟaññēkkāṁ ennatināl. aṅṅane niṅṅaḷkkitā niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkal ninn vyaktamāya pramāṇavuṁ mārgadarśanavuṁ kāruṇyavuṁ vannukiṭṭiyirikkunnu. enniṭṭuṁ allāhuvinṟe teḷivukaḷe niṣēdhiccutaḷḷukayuṁ, avayil ninn tiriññukaḷayukayuṁ ceytavanekkāḷ kaṭutta akrami āruṇṭ‌? nam'muṭe teḷivukaḷil ninn tiriññ kaḷayunnavarkk avar tiriññ kaḷaññukeāṇṭirunnatin pratiphalamāyi nāṁ kaṭutta śikṣa nalkunnatāṇ‌
